question: Who has been appointed as the new Economic Relations Secretary in the Ministry of External Affairs (MEA)?
explanation: Vijay Gokhale, a 1981 batch  Indian Foreign Service (IFS) officer, has been appointed as the new Secretary (Economic Relations) in the Ministry of External Affairs (MEA). Currently, he is Indian Ambassador to China. Beside this, Gokhale has served as Ambassador of India to Germany and also in Indian missions in Hong Kong, Hanoi, Beijing and New York.
